section.p: You distract the warriors with a pebble and, while they are searching in the tunnel, you slip out into the shadows and across the chamber to snatch the book.
Another passage lies ahead. You follow it to a grotto where a shaft of light pierces the gloom from a hole in the ceiling.

The light glitters on the surface of an underground lake, throwing shifting patterns of blue-green light across the walls. A masked figure steps out of the shadows. He attacks without waiting to see why you have come.
